attributes.action: I want all Halal food to be clearly marked in bold letters
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this because it is not clear to anyone at the moment, therefore we have no choice, on something that is seriously against a lot of our views on animal welfare.
attributes.background: The majority of people in this country are Christian, and care about animal welfare, and yet we are forced to unknowingly eat Halal meat, simply because it is not clearly marked.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require non-stunned and stunned meat to be labelled accordingly
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737327
